about.description: Software tools such as CellProfiler can extract hundreds of measurements from millions of cells in a typical high-throughput imaging experiment. The measurements are stored across thousands of CSV files. cytominer-database helps you organize these data into a single database backend, such as SQLite.
about.summary: cytominer-database provides command-line tools for organizing measurements extracted from images.

name: cytominer_database
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cytominer_database" %}
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: "f253822e2e9c01e815492e06a6611405c4bb8daa615f24745c4308f41645ec10"

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - cytominer-database=cytominer_database.command:command
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - backports.tempfile >=1.0rc1
    - click >=6.7
    - configparser >=3.5.0
    - csvkit >=1.0.2
    - pandas >=0.20.3
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - backports.tempfile >=1.0rc1
    - click >=6.7
    - configparser >=3.5.0
    - csvkit >=1.0.2
    - pandas >=0.20.3
    - python
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - cytominer_database
    - cytominer_database.commands
  commands:
    - cytominer-database --help

about:
  home: "https://github.com/cytomining/cytominer-database"
  license: "BSD"
  license_family: "BSD"
  license_file: "LICENSE.md"
  summary: "cytominer-database provides command-line tools for organizing measurements extracted from images."
  description:
    "Software tools such as CellProfiler can extract hundreds of measurements from millions of cells in a typical
     high-throughput imaging experiment. The measurements are stored across thousands of CSV files.
     cytominer-database helps you organize these data into a single database backend, such as SQLite."
  doc_url: "https://readthedocs.org/projects/cytominer-database/"
  dev_url: "https://github.com/cytomining/cytominer-database"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - gwaygenomics
